title: Korea Says FX Market Will Soon See Government’s Determination
description: South Korea said excessive won weakness isn’t desirable and foreign-exchange markets will soon see the government’s strong determination. The currency strengthened.
content: South Korea said excessive won weakness isn’t desirable and foreign-exchange markets will soon see the government’s strong determination. The currency strengthened.
